categories: Category:Cut content from Star Wars: The Clone Wars
Category:Articles that are known by a nickname

nodes.text: "Chatter" was the nickname of a radio communications clone major who participated in the Second Battle of Geonosis.
Chatter was slated to appear in "Landing at Point Rain," the fifth episode of second season of Star Wars: The Clone Wars. However, he was cut from the finished episode.
Concept art and several animatics featuring Chatter were later made available in the Jedi Archives section on the first disk of Star Wars: The Clone Wars The Complete Season Two.
